entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Debugger not debugging some variables correctly #7009
  • Workloads installation broken after attempt to install maui from 'main' branch #7008
  • Maui project pre-compiler errors using partial classes with multi-targetting #7005
  • ActionSheets do not work in MAUI Windows #7004
  • Cannot publish freshly created MAUI app as documented #7003
  • Exception being thrown on android physical device with latest version of .NET MAUI #7002
  • Change the control type announced by the VoiceOver screen reader when it encounters a Maui Picker control #7001
  • CarouselView with direct ContentView items in XAML shows error #7000
  • [Windows] Child controls of the grid are automatically resizing, with the size changes of parent Grid #6999
  • Is Maui.Graphics dead? #6998
    .NET 7
  • Modify our templates to include a better version for iOS or build SupportedPlatforms into our targets #6996
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [iOS] Modal Formsheet on iOS is currently not cancellable on Shell #6995
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [iOS] Reusing the same page for formsheet Modal causes measuring issues #6994
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Android][iOS] OnDestroying method of the Window extended class is not called [Lifecycle] #6993
  • iOS publishing not picking up project runtime identifier #6992
  • (Windows) RC2 - LayoutCycleException when the height or width of a control is less than 0 #6987
  • Issue in Clipping Images in Border #6986
  • Inconsistent RoundRectangle CornerRadius Border.ClipShape between Android and iOS #6981
    6.0.300
  • ContentPage.Disappearing event not raised under Windows #6980
  • Flow Direction does not apply to the Drawable view #6978
  • Entry control with IsPassword="true" broken under Windows #6977
  • DeviceDisplay.Current.MainDisplayInfo not available on windows #6976
    6.0.300-servicing

Closed

  • - #7006
  • [ContentProperty] ignored on Layouts #6944
    6.0.300
  • [Android] Wrong size using a FlexLayout inside a ScrollView #4079
    6.0.300
  • Slider value property is ignored on initialization #6957
    6.0.300
  • Border does not size and display properly #3541
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] CollectionView with grids and stacklayouts on itemtemplate #3062
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] [WinUI] Replacing CollectionView ItemTemplate Programmatically sets items to zero height, doesn't clear old items. #2525
    6.0.300
  • Exception if swipe to dismiss modal page on iOS (Simulator, real device not tested yet) #6666
    6.0.300
  • [Bug][Template] Move splash screen to Resources\Images folder of the template #2208
    6.0.300
  • Remove WebView2 Requirement, or Remove WebView2 data gathering #6723
  • Switches are unreliable inside a CollectionView #6346
    6.0.300
  • Unable to install latest workloads in Azure Pipelines #6983
  • Voiceover is not announcing the current count when we double tap on "click me" button. #6216
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Voiceover is not reading the Role of "click me" button. #6215
    6.0.300-servicing
  • macOS: Environment.GetFolderPath APIs return null #6984
  • [Android] AutomationId no longer works #4714
    6.0.300-servicing
  • On Windows you still cannot execute an application without running it from Visual Studio #6934
    6.0.300-servicing
  • The Shell FlyoutItems didn't appear when the app is in dark theme #6519
    6.0.300
  • Maui Picker with a Title property has no accessible name for screen readers using the UI Automation API #6928
    6.0.300-servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • [android] update AOT profile #7007
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1210.30 to 1.0.1210.39 #6991
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Fix incorrect CornerRadius in RoundRectangle #6989
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0.300
  • [Tizen] Update CollectionView item measure #6974
    area/collectionview 📃, platform/tizen, 6.0.300

Merged

  • [X] Process ContentProperty before Add() #6982
    area/Xaml </>, area/layout 🔲, 6.0.300
  • [Windows] Fix setting the initial Value on Slider #6988
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-slider, 6.0.300
  • iOS modals use `Window.ModalNavigationManager` vs `Application.NavigationProxy` #6813
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/modal, control-dialogalert, 6.0.300
  • Move loose resource items under a folder #6956
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.300
  • Don't set the Switch.IsOn unnecessarily #6985
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch, 6.0.300
  • [Android] Set ViewIdResourceName for UI Automators #6975
  • Fix sandbox project #6968
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Fragment from 2.4.1.2 to 2.4.2 #6774
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Windows] Set WinUI picker description to title #6970
    platform/windows 🪟, area/a11y, area/controls 🎮, control-picker

Updated

  • Remove Frame arrange/measure overrides #6794
    area/layout 🔲, control-frame, 6.0.300
  • Fix Maui.Controls.Sample Blazor dynamic root components trimming problem. #6966
    area/blazor 🕸️, 6.0.300
  • [iOS] Implement iOS Platform Specifics #5879
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300
  • [Windows] Correctly size the ImageButton BitmapImage #6663
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0.300
  • [Core] Propagate IsEnabled property from Layouts to childrens #6892
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, do-not-merge, 6.0.300
  • Fix WinUI fully templated RadioButton #6967
    area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton, 6.0.300
  • Unit tests for FlexLayoutManager #6800
    area/layout 🔲
  • Bump templates to be visible in VS 17.3 and up #5626
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄, 6.0.300
  • Implement InputView IsSpellCheckEnabled property #3729
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-servicing
  • [X] Optimize OnPlatform element syntax #5611
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, 6.0.300-servicing
  • Add the three-parameter overload #6790
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.300-servicing
  • [Android] Implement logic to move focus to next Entry #5740
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-servicing
  • [Android] Show keyboard when Entry, Editor and SearchBar get focus #5995
    t/bug, do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-servicing
